attributes.action: Stop wrongfull ref actions that cost clubs points and money
attributes.background: Every week FA referees book players and overturn goals that cost clubs points and money as football is a big money spinner and lost of people place bets on it when red cards are issued were they shouldn't be this is match fixing by if the card are recinded by the FA and the club still loses points

rejection.details: You could raise this issue with the FA.
